title: Is there an alternative to diagnosing mental illness?
itunes:author: David B. Feldman - psychology | social science | politics | mental health
itunes:summary: For most of the history of modern psychology, therapists paid a lot more attention to people's deficits than their strengths. But this is changing. Now, some psychologists believe that therapists should pay more attention to clients' strengths.
itunes:subtitle: For most of the history of modern psychology, theâ€¦
description: For most of the history of modern psychology, therapists paid a lot more attention to people's deficits than their strengths. But this is changing. Now, some psychologists believe that therapists should pay more attention to clients' strengths.
